title: JUST IN: SWAT officers in Cobb neighborhood; man barricaded
title_page: SWAT officers in Cobb neighborhood; person may be barricaded
text:
Cobb County police said SWAT officers are on the scene in a Marietta neighborhood near Windy Hill Road and Austell Road with a barricaded person.
Austell Road between Windy Hill Rd and County Services Pkwy is shut down while we deal with a barricaded subject on Arkose Dr. More updates soon. pic.twitter.com/E3QHnf3IPO — Cobb County Police (@cobbpolice1) October 30, 2018
The incident is happening in the 2000 block of Arkose Drive, police spokeswoman Sarah O’Hara said.
The person barricaded in the house is a man, according to Channel 2 Action News.
“SWAT is on scene and the residence has been isolated,” O’Hara said.
Arkose Drive is shut down at Windy Hill Road and Austell Road, and most of Austell Road has been shut down in the area.
— Please return to AJC.com for updates.
In other news:
